member.name: T:com.persephony.api.PersyClient
member.summary: The PersyClient is the main way within the SDK to interact with the Persephony API. After creating a PersyClient the user can any of it's many APIRequesters to make requests to the API.

member.name: M:com.persephony.api.PersyClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This constructor allows one to create a PersyClient that authenticates with one set of credentials but acts as a second account (i.e. a sub account).
member.param: The Account ID to use in your credentials for the Persephony API.
The Auth Token to use in your credentials for the Persephony API. This should be the matching Auth Token to the credAccountId parameter.
The Account ID of the account you want to act as. This should either be the same Account ID ass credAccountId or the id of a sub-account to the credAccountId's account.

members.member:
This constructor allows one to create a PersyClient that authenticates with one set of credentials and acts as that account.
This Constructor is a shortcut for calling 'PersyClient(credAccountId, credAuthToken, credAccountId)'.
The Account ID to use in your credentials for the Persephony API. The Auth Token to use in your credentials for the Persephony API. This should be the matching Auth Token to the credAccountId parameter. Thrown upon failed request.
